lines.text: The trouble with a bath is by the time you're through you're just as hot!
Aw, men are all alike. They're all easy enough to get along with so long as everything goes the way they want it to, but once it don't, good night.
I think the trouble is that people don't want to make allowances. They don't seem to realize that everybody wants a kind word now and... then.
I often think it's a shame that people don't seem able to live together in peace and quiet without making each other miserable.
00 with lights in this weather. Tomorrow I gotta go to Stanford for the trial.
Oh, you're going to Stanford tomorrow?
Sure, the whole crew's goin'. Why, what about it?
